snippet.title: Tomato and Basil Bruschetta
snippet.description: My first culinary "success." This recipe came from a great book _Cucina Amore_, and is often requested by friends and family.

snippet.title: Basil Cream Chicken
snippet.description: This is the easiest and one of the most impressive chicken dishes I make. Serve with grated parmesan at the table.

This is a wonderful lemon-flavored pesto. This was my first taste of pesto and I've never gone back!
